title: Trump's reciprocal tariffs take effect on April 2: What does it mean for India and how will it impact others?
description: Trump's reciprocal tariffs take effect on April 2: What does it mean for India and how will it impact others? US President Donald Trump's reciprocal tariffs will take effect on April 2, impacting global trade partners like India, China, the EU, and Mexico. The new tariffs, aimed at addressing trade ...
